In England, in the seven days to 20 January, there were 559,207 new confirmed cases (988.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 January, there were 585,024 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 4% (25,817 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 January is 13,642,522 (24,124.6 cases per 100,000 population).
